Name: DVIR Form: Passenger Car
Description: Driver Vehicle Inspection Report for Passenger Vehicles with Maintenance Checks and Minimum Compliance

Items.Name: Lights (all functional)
Items.Comment: Headlights, taillights, turn signals, brake lights

Items.Name: Windshield and Wipers (condition)
Items.Comment: Check for cracks, chips, and wiper operation

Items.Name: Mirrors (rear and side)
Items.Comment: Check for damage and functionality

Items.Name: Tires (pressure and condition)
Items.Comment: Check pressure, tread depth, and for damage

Items.Name: Wheels and Rims (no damage)
Items.Comment: Check for cracks, rust, or looseness

Items.Name: Leaks Under Vehicle (check for)
Items.Comment: Oil, coolant, brake fluid, transmission fluid

Items.Name: Exhaust System (intact)
Items.Comment: Check for damage or excessive rust

Items.Name: Seat Belts (operational)
Items.Comment: All seat belts engage and retract properly

Items.Name: Brakes (parking and service)
Items.Comment: Check parking brake and service brake responsiveness

Items.Name: Steering Wheel (responsive)
Items.Comment: Check for excessive play or stiffness

Items.Name: Horn (functional)
Items.Comment: Test horn operation

Items.Name: Dashboard Warning Lights (check)
Items.Comment: No warning lights illuminated during start-up

Items.Name: Engine Oil Level (proper)
Items.Comment: Check with dipstick or electronic gauge

Items.Name: Coolant Level (proper)
Items.Comment: Check when engine is cold

Items.Name: Brake Fluid Level (proper)
Items.Comment: Check reservoir level

Items.Name: Battery Condition (terminals)
Items.Comment: Check for corrosion and loose connections

Items.Name: Belts and Hoses (condition)
Items.Comment: Check for cracks, fraying, or leaks

Items.Name: Unusual Noises (during operation)
Items.Comment: Listen for grinding, squeaking, or rattling

Items.Name: Unusual Vibrations (during operation)
Items.Comment: Check steering wheel, brake pedal, and seat

Items.Name: Air Filter (accessible)
Items.Comment: Check condition if visible

Items.Name: Brake System Response (normal)
Items.Comment: Brakes should engage smoothly without delay

Items.Name: Steering Responsiveness (normal)
Items.Comment: Vehicle should respond immediately to steering input
